description: Task Assist is an AI-powered workflow automation tool that streamlines task management by breaking down complex tasks into actionable subtasks, scheduling them, and integrating with productivity tools like Slack and Google Calendar. It features a web interface (Streamlit), a Flask API, Slack notifications, asynchronous task processing (Celery + Redis), and is deployable as a multi-service Docker container (Flask, Streamlit, Nginx, Supervisor) ready for Azure Web App for Containers.
